title: Is it permissible to pray with a Mask on covid 19? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Shakeel says during the coven 19 pandemic we are required to wear masks all the time at work is it permissible to pray with it we have answered a similar question and the answer is yes there's no problem for a Muslim who fears infecting others or being infected by others to wear a mask all the time even throughout prayer
